attributes.action: put bin collections back to collecting more than one bin
attributes.additional_details: we need our bin collections back to more than one bin per household,one bin per household is no good with bigger familys, its bad enough now whats it going to be like if they do change it to 2 weekly collections the streets will be full of rats,mice and vermin, i have 4 young children and one bin is not enough and not allowed a bigger bin until there is 7 or more in a household.
attributes.background: we need our original collections back, today the bin man refused to empty my 2nd bin and also someone else on our street leaving  full bin with rotting food for yet another week, how many vermin and germs will that create

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bin collections are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
